name: Legend of Pewdie
description:
Legend of Pewdie is an action-adventure samurai swordplay game set in feudal japan.

Features:


- Aesthetics
Explore the island with aesthetically pleasing visuals.

- Sword play
Do you have enough to what it takes to master the sword. Fight with your enemies with unique combos and rewarding combat.

- Stealth
Though its optional but sneaking and killing is sometimes more fun than rushing towards enemies.

- Bosses
Fight with many challenging bosses across the island.

-Pets
you can pet them.
